tool_description: Evaluates the physical condition of returned items and assigns condition grades for restocking decisions.

item_barcode.description: Barcode of the item being assessed

visual_damage_score.description: Visual damage assessment score from 1-10 (1=perfect, 10=severely damaged)

functional_test_result.description: Result of functionality testing: working, partially_working, not_working

packaging_condition.description: Condition of original packaging: original, damaged, missing

accessories_present.description: Whether all original accessories are included

error_messages: Invalid damage score: Visual damage score must be between 1-10.
Invalid functional test result: Use working, partially_working, or not_working.
Invalid packaging condition: Use original, damaged, or missing.
Invalid hygiene category: Use personal_care, food_related, or standard.
usage: Assess the returned item by examining visual damage, testing functionality, checking packaging condition, verifying accessories, and noting hygiene classification to determine overall condition grade.

condition_grade.description: Overall condition rating: new, like_new, good, fair, poor

restockable.description: Whether item meets basic restocking criteria

assessment_notes.description: Detailed notes about the item's condition

recommended_action.description: Suggested next step: restock, refurbish, liquidate, dispose
